title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.4 - Traffic signal lights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.4 - Traffic signal lights

State Regulations

Traffic signal lights used in vehicular tunnels and on
bridges shall have the following meanings: Green light: all vehicles may proceed. Red light: all vehicles shall stop. Amber light: all vehicles shall proceed with
caution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
